casebody.data:
STATE
v.
LANDAVER & Insurance. No. 311P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Kenneth P. Andresen, Charlotte, for Aegis Security Ins. Co. Alan V. Pugh, Asheboro, for Randolph Co. Bd. of Education.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2005 by Respondent (Randolph Board of Education) to Deny Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
